name: Chairs Store Co
description: A full-stack web app featuring a dynamic shopping cart, seamless online ordering, and real-time order tracking, providing a smooth and interactive shopping experience from browsing to delivery.

name: Leviathon Salon Website
description: A fully responsive, beautiful, and modern website for an on trend full-service salon.

name: Pizza Restaurant Website
description: A restaurant website showcasing a visually appealing food menu, along with detailed information on ingredients, pricing, special offers, and dining options.

name: Kitten Store Website
description: displays item photos and prices, with a shopping cart feature allowing users to add items, view cart quantity, and total price.

name: PlantPicks Website
description: provides users with personalized plant recommendations based on specific criteria they input into a form.

name: StarGazers Society APOD Web App
description: Explore the wonders of space by using a website powered by the NASA API. Select any date to instantly access the captivating photo of the day.
